description.narrative: Increased capacity of government in selected areas to collect, compile, analyse and utilize sex- and other disaggregated child protection data for planning, policy, programme and budgetary action.

sector.narrative: Administrative data and Information Management System (IMS) including CPIMS+, GBVIMS+, MRMIMS+
Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - planning, co-ordination and programme monitoring
Violence, exploitation, and abuse - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services
Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: China United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased capacity of government in selected areas to collect, compile, analyse and utilize sex- and other disaggregated child protection data for planning, policy, programme and budgetary action.

description.narrative: The provincial Violence against Children Survey proceeded to data analysis stage. UNICEF and the National Center for Chronic and Noncommunicable Disease Control and Prevention (NCNCD) under the China CDC need to further discuss about information disclosure once the report is complete. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:26/08/2020

title.narrative: The collection of data on violence exploitation and abuse in the country is available on an ad-hoc basis (including one off surveys)

target.value: 2020:A plan is in place to implement a national VACS.

actual.value: 2019:The provincial survey in Zhejiang has been conducted successfully. Data analysis and report writing is under way. The report will be finalized by Q2 of 2020 and is planned to be disseminated by end of 2020.

title.narrative: Percent of UNICEF-supported pilot sites with an operational Child Protection Information Management System
